TopicTitle: Brave Kerbal Scientists - A Nerd Rock Cover of the Title Theme (w/ Lyrics)

Articles.Content:
Uh, so hey! I post here sometimes? Not often. But I read a lot, and I play a lot of KSP.

Anyway, I love this game a lot, and I love to do rock covers of Video Game music, so I figured why not combine them?

https://soundcloud.com/jotapeh-2/brave-kerbal-science

Anyway, it was just a bit of fun. OK, I take that back, a lot of fun.
You simply make a lyrics of the KSP main Theme?

You simply make a lyrics of the KSP main Theme?

And he made his own cover of the song itself. It's a good song, by the way, and I don't think anyone has made a song like this for KSP before.

Can you put it on Youtube so I can add it to my listen-to-while-playing-ksp playlist?

Edited May 16, 2015 by GregroxMun

Love this! Can we has a download?

Wow, this is pretty old!

Edited May 16, 2015 by Starwhip

Love this! Can we has a download?

Wow, this is pretty old!

Oh crap. It is. It's actually extremely sad that it didn't get any attention at the time!

Oh crap. It is. It's actually extremely sad that it didn't get any attention at the time!

Indeed. How could I not have seen this?!

Edit: I can't imagine how much time jotapeh spent on this. It's very, very well done, and highly original!

Jotapeh's last activity was six days after posting this thread... I doubt he is coming back...

Edited May 16, 2015 by Starwhip

Er, hey! I did actually come back. I still play KSP. I just didn't expect this to ever get any attention. Thanks so much for the kind words!

I will try to put it on YouTube, if that's still a thing people want.
It disappeared from soundcloud and that made me very sad.
